name: Not required but a flow that combines sensor name to mac and serial binding
create msg.details debug
grab the sensor info and add attribute with name
Look up Name

rules.to: {	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "availability_topic": msg.old_topic,	   "command_topic" : msg.old_topic,	   "command_template": "{{value_json.buttonPressed}}",	   "availability_template": "{{value_json.buttonPressed}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

{	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "device_class": msg.sensor_type ,	   "payload_on": true,	   "payload_off": false,	   "value_template": "{{value_json.open}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

{	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "device_class": msg.sensor_type ,	   "payload_on": true,	   "payload_off": false,	   "value_template": "{{value_json.wet}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

{	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "device_class": msg.sensor_type ,	   "payload_on": true,	   "payload_off": false,	   "entity_category": "diagnostic",	   "value_template": "{{value_json.usbPowered}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

{	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "device_class": msg.sensor_type ,	   "payload_on": true,	   "payload_off": false,	   "entity_category": "diagnostic",	   "value_template": "{{value_json.tamperDetection}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

{	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "payload_on": true,	   "payload_off": false,	   "entity_category": "diagnostic",	   "value_template": "{{value_json.batteryCoverPresent}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

{	   "name": msg.sensor_type ,	   "unique_id" : msg.sensor_mac_clean & "-" & msg.sensor_type,	   "payload_on": true,	   "payload_off": false,	   "value_template": "{{value_json.cableConnected}}",	   "device": msg.device	}

name: Binary Sensor
Button
func:
msg.topic = msg.discovery_button + msg.sensor_mac_clean + "/" + msg.sensor_type + "/config" 
return msg;
